recipeList.directions:
1. Mince the garlic and ginger.
2. Cut the chicken into cubes and season with salt and pepper.
3. Heat 1 tbsp of sesame oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
4. Add the chicken and cook for 5-7 minutes until cooked through.
5. Add the minced garlic and ginger, then cook for another minute.
6. In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, rice vinegar,and sugar. Pour the mixture over the chicken and stir to coat.
7. Cook for another 2-3 minutes
recipeList.ingredients: Chicken (1 lb), Rice (2 cups), Broccoli (1/2 lb), Soy Sauce (2 tbsp), Rice Vinegar (2 tbsp), Sesame Oil (1 tbsp), Garlic (2 cloves), Ginger (1 tsp), Sugar (1 tsp)

recipeList.recipeName: Chicken, Rice, and Broccoli Breakfast Bowl
recipeList.directions: 1. Chop the chicken into cubes. 2. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until just cooked through. Add salt and pepper to taste. 3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside on a plate. 4. Add the rice and broccoli to the skillet and stir to combine. 5. Add the available water, bring to a simmer then reduce the heat to low. 6. Cover the skillet and let simmer until the rice and broccoli are cooked. 7. Once the dish is cooked, add the chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine. 8. Serve and enjoy!
recipeList.ingredients: chicken (3 cups), rice (1 cup), broccoli (1 cup)
